response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value for both of us. This product has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations, offering unparalleled benefits that align perfectly with your needs. Given its exceptional quality and the unique features it possesses, we believe its true worth lies at $800,000. Considering its significance to you and the market value, we are offering it to you at this exclusive price. We trust this proposition will allow you to secure an asset that promises significant returns on investment and enhances your business operations. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 800000}
